id.description: Unique identifier for the SSL certificate

common_name.description: The common name of the entity the certificate was issued to

organization.description: The organization the certificate was issued to

organization_unit.description: The organizational unit the certificate was issued to

common_name.description: The common name of the entity the certificate was issued by

organization.description: The organization the certificate was issued by

organization_unit.description: The organizational unit the certificate was issued by

valid_from.description: The time the certificate is valid from

valid_to.description: The time the certificate is valid to

created_at.description: Time when SSL certificate was uploaded
